parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>0.50

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Unit Inventory

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Removes goggles from unit (diver goggles for example). This command does not remove NVGoggles. Use [[unassignItem]] and [[removeItem]] or just [[unlinkItem]] for latter.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''removeGoggles''' unit

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> unit: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code> [[removeGoggles]] assaultDiver;
</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[goggles]], [[addGoggles]]
</value></part></template>
